rules.name: Password Injection - UC3: Static Password Injection
Password Injection - UC4: API Password Injection

configuration.autoInjectJS:
<html>
<HEAD>
	<TITLE>login</TITLE>
	<META HTTP-EQUIV='pragma' CONTENT='no-cache'>
	<META HTTP-EQUIV='cache-control' CONTENT='no-cache'>
</HEAD>
<body>
Logging in... 
<form id="login" method="POST" action="./loginHandler.jsp">
	<input type="hidden" name="f_token" value="1"/>
	<input type="hidden" name="f_action" value="logon"/>
	<input type="hidden" name="f_process" value="Admin"/>
</form>
<script>
var form = document.getElementById("login");

var usernameField = document.createElement("INPUT");
usernameField.setAttribute("name", "%s");
usernameField.setAttribute("value", "autosubmit");
usernameField.setAttribute("type", "hidden");
form.append(usernameField);

var passwordField = document.createElement("INPUT");
passwordField.setAttribute("name", "%s");
passwordField.setAttribute("value", "Aut0Su3Mit!");
passwordField.setAttribute("type", "hidden");
form.append(passwordField);

document.forms[0].submit();
</script>
</body>
</html>
